info.title: Generic API
info.description: APIs that power the map, navigation, hierarchy, area relations, announcements, logs, syndication feeds.

get.description: Given the an area type / area code combination, produces the ancestors of the area - i.e. larger, more general areas of which the requested area is a member.

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area whose ancestors are being requested.

parameters.name: area_code
parameters.description: Code of the area whose ancestors are being requested.

200.description: Returns ancestors of the area code.

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

example.nhsTrustName: Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid area type and / or area code.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Given an area type / area code combination, produces the latest available record for a Super Output Area (SOA).

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area for which the latest data is requested.

parameters.name: area_code
parameters.description: Code of the area for which the latest data is requested.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Name of the metric for which the latest data is requested.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Record date. If not defined, the latest available record will be returned.

200.description: Returns the latest available record for the given Super Output Area (SOA).

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid area type and / or area code.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Provides an array of areas of an area type.

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area whose children are being requested.

200.description: Returns all areas for the given area type

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid area type.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Given a category (website page), returns all available areas.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Category of the page whose areas are being requested.

200.description: Returns the areas for the specified category (page).

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid category (page name).

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Given a category (page name) / area type combination, returns all areas available for that category under the given area type.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Category of the page whose areas are being requested.

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area by which to filter the areas associated with the given category.

200.description: Returns all areas for the specified category / area type combination.

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

404.description: Not found. Likely due to an invalid category and / or area type.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Metric name or part thereof.

get.description: Returns change logs, results are paginated to 20 results per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search the contents of the change logs for matching strings.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Returns the change logs for the specified category (page).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Returns the change logs of the specified type.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Returns page of results. There are 20 results per page and page count starts at 1.

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the banners to be returned. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Returns the banners for the specified category (page).

parameters.name: area_type
parameters.description: Type of the area by which to filter the areas associated with the given category.

parameters.name: area_name
parameters.description: Name of the area within the given area type.

phe-server-loc.description: Identifier for the specific server responding to the request.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.

get.description: Returns change logs for specified month.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Month and year formatted as YYYY-MM

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search the contents of the change logs for matching strings.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Returns the change logs for the specified category (page).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Returns the change logs of the specified type.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Returns page of results. There are 20 results per page and page count starts at 1.

phe-website-request.description: Identifier to determine whether the request originates from the website.

400.description: Bad request. Reason provided in response body where possible.

429.description: Too many requests - request has been throttled.

retry-after.description: Time in seconds to wait before resubmitting the request.
